title: smeSpire - A European Community of SMEs built on Environmental Digital Content and Languages
segmentation: SMS Fire is an acronym.
The first part, which is SMS.

The second part is the last part of the word inspire, and for those of you are not eventually so familiar with inspire, it is important to make a short, straight statement, because Inspire is an European directive entered into into 4th, 2007, which is introducing a sort.
Let me say revolution in Europe because.

Literally, it aims at establishing an infrastructure for geospatial information across Europe in practice, in a road map until 2019, all the environmental digital content which any relation with any environmental policy will become interoperable across Europe through implementing rules and laws.
So this is really a revolution because it implies many organizational.
Aspects to be tackled.
The starting date of our support action was the 1st of May duration 24 months.
This is the budget and the operational website is SM inspired dot EU.
The concrete output of.

This action an assessment in the 12 EU participating Member States over market potential for the geospatial ICT SMS in relation to inspire as an integral component of the digital agenda for Europe to characterize obstacles and barriers for Geo ICT companies.
To enter this market and also identifying the training needs as defined in the big at the beginning of the project.

Then the second one is a training package based on vocational training curricula designed to train people working with environmental data content in the training package, including a catalog translated into the languages of the participating countries, will be made available on an elearning training platform.
Then we will have a best practice catalog, including.
Lessons learned and also unsuccessful outcomes, unfortunately because also from them we can learn something in the field of management of environmental digital data content across Europe.

A serious of dissemination events in the form of Smith's power days, which in the last semester of the project will be organized in the 12 participating countries in order to involve the local stakeholders, then a network of SMS and other institutional stakeholders aiming at bridging the gap between the inspired driven demand of environmental digital data and industry driven.
Offer of jail ICT solutions.
Stimulating and encouraging the role of SMS can play then a business model.

And increase the awareness about the strategies in Europe regarding interoperability like the European interoperability Strategy, European Interoperability framework in the ISA program, which is interoperable solution for public administration in Europe.
The.
Target users, target groups and users.
Same thing, are they already established?

SM is active in the GCD domain but also new entrance SMS in the diversity domain consisting of startup asmi's already established ICT asmis not necessarily aware of the potential in the geospatial domain.
The radius of the circles are is not representing any scaled dimension information, but just to give you an idea that the aim is to.
Grow up the number of actors.
The.
Partnership we are 15 partners from 12 Member States and I'm proud to say that SMS, partisan support action for SMS driven by SMS.
Eight of ours are SMS.
All of us active in the Inspire implementation and the Geo ICT Sector 1 partner SMEs is project coordinator.
Other SMS are leader in more packages and we are consuming most than 1/2 of the budget.
But the consortium is complemented by very powerful representations by three research centers, one of them being the G Research Joint Research Center, which is the father or the mother of Inspire.
Very interested in how we are going to push toward the SMS dimension of this implementation.
Catholic University of Lublin already involved in a state of play and monitoring activities and.
Graphitic very active in the research domain.
Then we have two national agencies from Czech Republic and Slovak nonprofit Association and Government Company in Spain called Fracassa.
These are the.

Because all of us said, wow, this is the call we were expecting in order to fit our proposal idea and the misfire.
Let's say family is open to new members.
Wishing to join our network, I thank you very much for your attention and the organizers for having given the opportunity to be here.
Thank you.
